member.name: T:Frends.GoogleCloudStorage.DeleteBucket.Definitions.CredentialType
member.summary: Supported credential types for URL signing

member.name: F:Frends.GoogleCloudStorage.DeleteBucket.Definitions.CredentialType.ServiceAccountCredentials
member.summary: Google OAuth 2.0 credential for accessing protected resources using an access token.

member.name: F:Frends.GoogleCloudStorage.DeleteBucket.Definitions.CredentialType.ImpersonatedCredentials
member.summary: Allows a service account or user credential to impersonate a service account.

member.name: F:Frends.GoogleCloudStorage.DeleteBucket.Definitions.CredentialType.ComputeCredentials
member.summary: Google OAuth 2.0 credential for accessing protected resources using an access token.

member.name: F:Frends.GoogleCloudStorage.DeleteBucket.Definitions.CredentialType.GoogleCredentials
member.summary: Credential for authorizing calls using OAuth 2.0. It is a convenience wrapper that allows handling of different types of credentials (like Google.Apis.Auth.OAuth2.ServiceAccountCredential, Google.Apis.Auth.OAuth2.ComputeCredential or Google.Apis.Auth.OAuth2.UserCredential) in a unified way.

member.name: P:Frends.GoogleCloudStorage.DeleteBucket.Definitions.Input.DeleteObjects
member.summary: Determines if objects inside the bucket will be deleted. Needs to be enabled if deleting a bucket with objects inside.

member.name: P:Frends.GoogleCloudStorage.DeleteBucket.Definitions.Input.ThrowIfNoBucketFound
member.summary: Determines should Task throw exception if no bucket is found with the given name.

member.name: P:Frends.GoogleCloudStorage.DeleteBucket.Definitions.Input.CredentialFilePath
member.summary: Full path to the json file which has credentials for Google.

member.name: M:Frends.GoogleCloudStorage.DeleteBucket.GoogleCloudStorage.DeleteBucket(Frends.GoogleCloudStorage.DeleteBucket.Definitions.Input,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Deletes a bucket from Google Cloud Storage. [Documentation](https://tasks.frends.com/tasks/frends-tasks/Frends.GoogleCloudStorage.DeleteBucket)
member.returns: Result object { string BucketName, string Location, string StorageClass, DateTime TimeCreated }
